fields.name: Dice
fields.description: Games primarily using dice as the main mechanic.

fields.name: Card
fields.description: Games played primarily with a standard deck of cards.

fields.name: Deck building
fields.description: Games where players construct a personal deck of cards during play.

fields.name: Role playing
fields.description: Games where players assume the roles of characters in a fictional setting.

fields.name: Sports
fields.description: Games based on or simulating real-world sports.

fields.name: Adventure
fields.description: Games featuring exploration and narrative-driven challenges.

fields.name: Cooperative
fields.description: Games where players work together against the game itself.

fields.name: Battle
fields.description: Games centered around combat and tactical warfare.
